👋 Hi! I'm Emily.

Chicago, IL

I'm a full-stack Software Engineer with experience in JavaScript/Node.js, Ruby, PostgreSQL, Go, and React.

Most recently, I built SmoothSail, an open-source feature flagging solution with user-targeting capabilities for testing in production.

Resume Read SmoothSail Case Study

SmoothSail enables precise targeting of users, allowing engineers to roll out new features to specific groups and minimize the impact of unexpected bugs in production.

It gives developers the ability to decouple the release of new features from their deployment, and easily roll back unsuccessful features with a single click.


Read SmoothSail Case Study Watch the Presentation
